list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add day1 input file
A new file named input.txt has been added to the day1 directory. The file contains encoded data needed for day 1's challenge/problem.

task.summary:
Add .idea configuration files
This commit adds misc.xml, vcs.xml, modules.xml, and workspace.xml configuration files to the .idea directory. These files are essential for carrying the project settings related to various plugins, version control system configuration, and project output directory, among others.

Add package.json and package-lock.json files
This commit includes the addition of package.json and package-lock.json files for the 'advent-of-code-2023' project. These files declare the project's dependencies and consist of necessary metadata for the project, such as module details, package dependencies for development and the project version.

Create new tsconfig.json file
This commit introduces a new tsconfig.json file for the project. The file defines TypeScript compiler options such as the module system, target ECMAScript version, and an output directory. It also specifies a runtime library (lib) for use with the project.

Create new Advent Of Code 2023.iml file
This commit introduces a new 'Advent Of Code 2023.iml' file for the project. This file is essential for the web module of the project, setting parameters and defining the module's root manager output directory, orderEntry type, and source folder.

Add new day1.ts file to read and process input data
Introduces a script in TypeScript that reads an input file, processes its content into an array, and calculates the sum of its elements. The script, day1.ts, is designed to handle errors gracefully and to specifically process numeric elements, including repeating single-digit values.

Add day1 input file
A new file named input.txt has been added to the day1 directory. The file contains encoded data needed for day 1's challenge/problem.
